General.Name: Obigo Inc.
General.Description: OBIGO Inc. operates as a Web service company. Its range of solutions include HTML5 browser, App Framework, and Web applications for various devices and platforms, such as automotive, smart phones, smart TV, and other consumer electronics. The company offers App Framework, which enables apps to run in automotive domain for OEM and Tier1; Web SDK that provides development integrated Obigo App experience with design to validation through developer portal; and cloud-based API configuration platform. It also offers cloud app center, which include app management server, big data analytics, update agent and DM client, and content sourcing; and Telematics that enables remote vehicle control, diagnostics, and notification with various devices, such as phone, watch, tablet, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
